name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Myers D. THOMAS, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
EAGEN, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Myers D. THOMAS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
EAGEN, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph N. Bongiovanni, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.

F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Richard A. Sprague, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Division, Philadelphia, Suzanne Balen Ercole, Asst. Dist. Atty., Abraham J. Gafni, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 461
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Myers D. THOMAS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 25, 1974.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
Joseph N. Bongiovanni, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Richard A. Sprague, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Division, Philadelphia, Suzanne Balen Ercole, Asst. Dist. Atty., Abraham J. Gafni, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
